To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Beta _b;

// In Initialize()

_b = B(target, reference, period);

// In OnData()
if (_b.IsReady)
{
    var current = _b.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()

self.b = self.B(target, reference, period)

# In OnData()
if self.b.IsReady:
    current = self.b.Current.Value
